creator: sohankumar.soni@sos.sungard.com
zongaro@ca.ibm.com
text:
This looks like it's probably a problem with Xalan-Java.  That project uses 
Jira for it's bug tracking, so I've marked this bug as resolved.  Please go to 
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XALANJ and click on "Create New Issue".
